鞽字的基本解释

鞽
qiáo
见“鞒”。

鞽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiāo］
［《廣韻》起嚻切，平宵，溪。］
“鞒1”的繁体字。
杂戏表演高跷用的木棍。
[②]［juē］
［《集韻》訖約切，入藥，見。］
同“屩1”。“鞒2”的繁体字。
草鞋。
[③]［qiáo］
“鞒3”的繁体字。
马鞍拱起的部份。

鞽字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞽； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1391第38
【廣韻】起嚻切【集韻】丘祅切，?音趫。【廣韻】本作橇。【集韻】又作橋。詳木部橇字註。　又【集韻】訖約切，音脚。本作屩。詳尸部屩字註。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiāo］
["Guangyun" from the beginning of the cut, flat night, creek. ]
"鞒1" in traditional characters.
Wooden sticks for stilts.
[②] [juē]
["Jiyun" is about to cut, used as medicine, see. ]
Same as "屩1". "鞒2" in traditional characters.
Straw shoes.
[③]［qiáo］
"鞒3" in traditional characters.
The arched part of the saddle.
鞽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞽; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1391 Page 38
[Guang Yun] Qiu cut and cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Zuo cut,? Sound. [Guang Yun] This is a sled. 【Jiyun】It is also a bridge. Detailed note of Mubuqi word.　 [Ji Yun] Yu Yue cut, sound foot. This is a dick. Detailed note of the corpse part 屩 word.
